H0.text: Writing a science report is an activity during which a student should wear goggles.

H1.text: Wearing goggles should be done when mixing baking soda with water.

H2.text: Measuring the length of a shadow is an activity during which a student should wear goggles.

H3.text: Examining a leaf with a microscope is the activity during which a student should wear goggles.
